check.name: LineLengthCheck
check.description:
Checks for long lines.

Rationale: Long lines are hard to read in printouts or if developers have limited screen space for the source code, e.g. if the IDE displays additional information like project tree, class hierarchy, etc.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify file extensions that are accepted.

property.name: ignorePattern
property.description: Specify pattern for lines to ignore.

property.name: max
property.description: Specify the maximum line length allowed.
